  * Support 
  * Log in 

Talk to us

Web SDK (SaaS)

## Identity verification APIs to support your web application

###

Verifai's Web SDK enables identity verification over the web. Connect your web
application with our powerful platform via easy-to-use APIs. Let us streamline
and speed up your verification process. Verify identity document securely and
perform face matching effortlessly.

Talk to us

### A clear image of your customer’s identity

Verify the identity of your customers. Scan, authenticate and extract text
from passports, driver's licenses, ID cards, and other travel documents within
seconds. Add a selfie capture step for face matching. Fits into any business
process, regardless of use case and platform.

Learn more

### Increase satisfaction & conversion

Your customer wants to get over and done with the identity verification step
as quickly as possible. Why let legitimate customers wait? Verifai lets your
customers verify their identity digitally and in real-time via simple steps
using our software, so they can proceed using your product in no-time.

Learn more

### Accelerate digital customer onboarding

Forget about the time-consuming and tedious onboarding processes that drive
potential customers away. Realize a smooth multilingual onboarding experience
by using our software to verify the identity of your customers.

Learn more

# All the features you need to know your customers

### Capture data from identity documents with ease

  * Supports more than 2,000 international identity documents.
  * Capture documents easily via desktop, mobile or even flatbed scanners.
  * Decide yourself which data you want to process.
  * Perform fraud & validity checks.  


Learn more about document data capture

### Facilitate a streamlined handover from PC to mobile

  * Allow users to capture their ID using their mobile phone while on desktop. 
  * Fast and user-friendly mobile handover, no app install required.
  * Supports SMS and QR codes.
  * Once captured, the user is redirected back to the desktop.  


Learn more about the mobile handover

### Increase customer trust with privacy filters

  * Block non-required sensitive personal data.
  * Fully adaptable to your requirements.
  * Store a secure copy of the ID in your systems.
  * Comply with international privacy laws.

Learn more about privacy filters

### Improve your fraud defense with face matching

  * Let users take a selfie and we compare the face in the selfie to the face on the identity document.
  * Receive a confidence score how similar the faces are.
  * Spoof-proof and super user-friendly.

Learn more about biometric verification

# Easily integrated APIs and SDKs

Our JavaScript-powered software development kit (SDK) for the web gives you
all the tools you need to seamlessly add identity verification to your web
application, whether it’s a website or a progressive web app. You implement a
plugin, we do the rest. Because of the flexible structure you decide which
components of Verifai you use. The SDK is extremely easy-to-use so that you'll
have it up and running within a day.

Discover our documentation

### Example app for developers

Need web integration, but don't know where to start? Start with our example
web app. This way you get Verifai working in a snap.

Web Example app

Live demo

### Support center

Do you have questions? Then take a look at our extensive support center. And
if your question hasn't been answered yet, we're always ready to help you.

Visit our support center

Contact us now

Install the Verifai Web SDK

    
    
    import WebSDK from "@verifai/websdk"
    
    const config  = {
    
      token: OTP_TOKEN,
    
      onSuccess: (sessionID) => {
        // Getting the Verifai result
      },
      onCanceled: (sessionID) => {
        // Your customer cancelled the Verifai flow
      }
    }
    
    const verifaiElement = document.getElementById('verifai-mount')
    const webSDK = new WebSDK(config, verifaiElement)
    webSDK.start()

# The identity verification platform built for security and growth

Gain a competitive advantage with fast and easy-to-use identity verification.
Verifai's integrated platform lets you grow your business without hassle.

### Data protection for tomorrow, built in today’s product

Customers expect a safe and transparent process, especially when it concerns
personal data. At Verifai, the protection of personal data is top priority.
According to the principle of privacy by design, we minimize data processing
and maximize data confidentiality. Both within our own processes and by
encouraging our customers to do the same.

### Don't leave legitimate customers in the dark

Customers value their time and they expect you to value it too. Achieve a fast
and fluid easy-to-use verification process with Verifai, while minimizing
identity fraud risks. With our software, you guarantee an optimal experience
for every user.

### We speak your customer’s language

It doesn't matter what language your customer speaks. By supporting 20 major
languages, we support your customer's mother tongue. The nice thing is: you
don't have to do anything. The language is automatically applied according to
the user's language settings.

### We deliver the tools, you control them

Whether you want a secure copy of an identity document, process data of such a
document, or check the document ownership, Verifai offers the complete package
to support any organization. You decide what you need and we make it happen.
On top of that, all data processing is fully compliant with legal
requirements.

# Let's get started

We can’t wait to give your customers the best identity verification experience
ever. Can you?

Talk to us

GDPR compliant

256-bit SSL encryption

Processed in the Netherlands

Talk to us

Identity verification

## Apply a multi-layered digital approach to identity verification

###

Establish the true identity of your users with next-generation document &
biometric verification. Capture, read and authenticate government-issued IDs
in a snap, check the user's liveness and receive the result in a comprehensive
& ready-to-use outline. Reduce the risk of fraud and let your organization
grow.

Talk to us

# Let us verify your customers

Verifai provides state-of-the-art identity verification software solutions for
your organization. Use our software for identity document verification and
biometric authentication, full in compliance with local privacy regulations.

### Choose the level of confidence that fits your needs

  * Give your users an intuitive ID document capture experience by using our AI-powered SDKs and APIs for mobile and web.
  * Get complete assurance of document authenticity by having your users perform a quick NFC check.
  * Apply biometric verification to get to know if the user performing the verification is actually living.

### Meet the highest standards of safety, integrity and stability

  * Meet strict requirements for Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti Money Laundering (AML) by getting an in-depth view of the identity of your customers.
  * Comply with GDPR & CCPA guidelines by masking sensitive user data using our privacy filters and applying the principles of data minimization to gain user trust.
  * Minimize errors and take the burden of verification off your hands by letting us do the hard work, while you can focus on more important matters.

### Prevent growing pains when scaling your business

  * Grow beyond the limits of national borders by using our extensive database of government-issued IDs, containing over 2,000 documents from over 150 countries. 
  * Save time & money and increase conversions by simplifying and automating the verification process.
  * Don't get stalled by big contracts by using our easy & transparent usage-based pricing without hidden fees. Affordable for organizations of all sizes.

# Start verifying your customers today

Mobile SDK, Web SDK or ready-to-use app? Choose the products that suit you
best and create the best customer experience for every use case.

  1.   2.   3. 

##### Web SDK

Verifai’s Web SDK allows you to seamlessly integrate Verifai into your web
application and know who your customer really is. Let users upload a copy of
their ID in a snap or facilitate a device handover from computer to mobile to
let users capture their ID directly, app installation required.

LEARN MORE

##### iOS & Android SDK

Verifai's multilingual SDKs for iOS and Android allow you to have identity
verification working in your own mobile app in no time. Use any mobile device
to capture, read and verify identity documents for authenticity. Fully
customizable and up and running within a day.

LEARN MORE

##### ID verification app

Verifai's ready-to-use ID verification app is perfect for organizations that
want to capture their customer's identity documents without implementation
effort. Use a mobile device to scan ID documents and authenticate the document
by reading the chip inside biometric identity documents.

LEARN MORE

Previous Next

# The identity verification platform built for security and growth

Gain a competitive advantage with fast and easy-to-use identity verification.
Verifai's integrated platform lets you grow your business without hassle.

### A dashboard to manage all your solutions in one place

Complete insight in scans and statistics, allowing you to stay in control of
the costs. Manage the rights and permissions of co-workers so that only the
appropriate person has access to the right information. And with unconditional
access to all our SDKs and APIs for mobile & web, you always have the latest
version at your fingertips.

### Data protection for tomorrow, built in today’s product

Customers expect a safe and transparent process, especially when it concerns
personal data. At Verifai, the protection of personal data is top priority.
According to the principle of privacy by design, we minimize data processing
and maximize data confidentiality. Both within our own processes and by
encouraging our customers to do the same.

# Let's get started

We can’t wait to give your customers the best identity verification experience
ever. Can you?

Talk to us

GDPR compliant

256-bit SSL encryption

Processed in the Netherlands
